senses: [{"definition":"An abridgement or summary of a longer publication.","example":null},{"definition":"Something that concentrates in itself the qualities of a larger item, or multiple items.","example":null},{"definition":"An abstraction; an abstract term; that which is abstract.","example":null},{"definition":"The theoretical way of looking at things; something that exists only in idealized form.","example":null},{"definition":"An abstract work of art.","example":null},{"definition":"A summary title of the key points detailing a tract of land, for ownership; abstract of title.","example":null},{"definition":"To separate; to disengage.","example":null},{"definition":"To remove; to take away; withdraw.","example":null},{"definition":"To steal; to take away; to remove without permission.","example":null},{"definition":"To summarize; to abridge; to epitomize.","example":null},{"definition":"To conceptualize an ideal subgroup by means of the generalization of an attribute, as follows: by apprehending an attribute inherent to one individual, then separating that attribute and contemplating it by itself, then conceiving of that attribute as a general quality, then despecifying that conceived quality with respect to several or many individuals, and by then ideating a group composed of those individuals perceived to possess said quality.","example":null},{"definition":"To extract by means of distillation.","example":null},{"definition":"To consider abstractly; to contemplate separately or by itself; to consider theoretically; to look at as a general quality.","example":null},{"definition":"To withdraw oneself; to retire.","example":null},{"definition":"To draw off (interest or attention).","example":"He was wholly abstracted by other objects."},{"definition":"To perform the process of abstraction.","example":null},{"definition":"To create abstractions.","example":null},{"definition":"To produce an abstraction, usually by refactoring existing code. Generally used with \"out\".","example":"He abstracted out the square root function."},{"definition":"Derived; extracted.","example":null},{"definition":"Drawn away; removed from; apart from; separate.","example":null},{"definition":"Not concrete: conceptual, ideal.","example":null},{"definition":"Difficult to understand; abstruse; hard to conceptualize.","example":null},{"definition":"Separately expressing a property or attribute of an object that is considered to be inherent to that object: attributive, ascriptive.","example":null},{"definition":"Pertaining comprehensively to, or representing, a class or group of objects, as opposed to any specific object; considered apart from any application to a particular object: general, generic, nonspecific; representational.","example":null},{"definition":"Absent-minded.","example":null},{"definition":"Pertaining to the formal aspect of art, such as the lines, colors, shapes, and the relationships among them.","example":null},{"definition":"Insufficiently factual.","example":null},{"definition":"Apart from practice or reality; vague; theoretical; impersonal; not applied.","example":null},{"definition":"(grammar) As a noun, denoting an intangible as opposed to an object, place, or person.","example":null},{"definition":"Of a class in object-oriented programming, being a partial basis for subclasses rather than a complete template for objects.","example":null}]
